Mac OSX Applications like Caffeine and now Amphetamine are simple apps that cause them not to go to sleep.

You can also use a simple terminal command:

Open a terminal and type:

```bash
caffeinate -d
```

h/t [Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/macapps/comments/tgxtnu/is_amphetamine_still_the_best_app_to_prevent_sleep/)
